00032 /*
00033  * Default to unsigned long for the base limb type,
00034  * except the 8086 where uint is to be used instead.
00035  */
00036 #if defined _MSC_VER && _MSC_VER <= 800
00037 #define t_int uint
00038 #else
00039 #define t_int ulong
00040 #endif
